text: My mom was a Democrat and I was scared to death that she was gonna blow it. First I was going to hell with Monroe, and now to Republican hell with Nixon.
author: Tommy Rettig

text: It's impossible to put yourself first when you're a mom.
author: Jillian Michaels

text: My parents were both in show business. My father was an actor, my mom an actress, and both singers, dancers and actors. They met in Los Angeles doing a play together and so I grew up in a show biz family.
author: Micky Dolenz

text: My dad was a good athlete. My mom had longevity. There were some athletic genes that certainly got passed down.
author: Hale Irwin

text: Usually a family is led through the mom or the dad and their career and for the family to be led by my career, even though God has led it, could be a lot of pressure.
author: Stacie Orrico
